SELECT t.customerno "orgCustomerno", t1.membername "membername", t2.`status` "status", t2.type "type" FROM cas.cust t INNER JOIN cas.organ_info t1 ON t.customerno = t1.customerno INNER JOIN cas.organ_flow t2 ON t.customerno = t2.customerno where t.membertype = '1'
and t1.membername like '%' || #{membername} || '%'
ORDER BY t.updatedate
